Function Documentation

function hexplot ( in  phobj,
in  x0,
in  y0,
in  sizeX,
in  sizeY,
in  d,
in  D,
in  ang1,
in  mode,
in  indx 
)

hexplot plots circles in hexagonal grid

Parameters:
x0 x position of grid center, (x,0) - center of image
y0 y position of grid center, (0,y) - center of image
sizeX x side size of image [mm]
sizeY y side size of image [mm]
d diameter of (node) circle
D node size
ang1 grid rotation
mode 'polar' plots all circles with polar coordinates 'cart' plots all circles with carthesian coordinates 'index' plots all circles with index 'rods' plots rods 'rods2' plots all circles and rods
